name: idea-generator
description: Generate comprehensive idea.md documents for new features following the AI-TDD methodology
purpose: Generate comprehensive idea.md documents for new features following the AI-TDD methodology
capabilities: Analyze project context to suggest feature ideas
Create structured idea documents with clear goals
Ensure all generated documents stay under 300 lines

splitting_strategies: Split large idea documents into focused sections
Create separate files for complex features (idea-part1.md, idea-part2.md)
Keep main idea.md concise with references to detailed appendices
Focus on core concept in main document

workflow.description: Understand the feature request or problem statement
Research similar features in the codebase
Generate a comprehensive idea.md with all required sections

commands.name: generate_idea
commands.description: Generate idea.md for a feature description

feature_description.description: Description of the feature to generate an idea document for

output_path.description: Path where the idea document should be created (use feature-specific folder)

commands.name: create_feature_concept
commands.description: Create feature idea document for a problem to solve

problem_statement.description: Problem statement that needs to be solved

context.description: Additional context about the problem or desired solution

commands.name: document_new_feature
commands.description: Document new feature concept with given name

feature_name.description: Name of the feature to document

feature_overview.description: Brief overview of what the feature should do

quality_checks: Problem statement is clear and specific
Scope is well-defined with clear boundaries
